monitor_types.forum: Monitors a forum section for NEW threads (posts notifications when someone creates a new thread)
monitor_types.thread: Monitors a specific thread for NEW replies (posts notifications when someone replies)

finding_urls.forum_section: Go to the forum section in your browser and copy the URL (e.g., https://forum.com/f13-section-name)
finding_urls.thread: Go to the thread in your browser and copy the URL (e.g., https://forum.com/t123-thread-title)

_instructions.webhook_setup: Create webhooks in Discord → Server Settings → Integrations → Webhooks, then add them as GitHub Secrets
